My beautiful and incredible mother just turned 80!!!!
At her birthday, I asked what she wished for‚Ä¶
Peace‚Ä¶

Excited to share what‚Äôs coming‚Ä¶
Happy Creative‚Ä¶

Resolution‚Ä¶
Our creative souls will starve no longer‚Ä¶
#happycreative

Fan Art‚Ä¶ creativity inspires creativity. 
Thanks for the love‚Ä¶

A decade‚Ä¶ ten long years‚Ä¶ and yet it feels like yesterday when we were singing happy birthday to you for the big 40!

The world isn‚Äôt the same brother‚Ä¶ as a species, one might say we are struggling. But I think of you, and I smile and know everything is going to be alright. 

I was going through images to celebrate this sacred day. Memories flashing before me, one better than the next‚Ä¶ but I couldn‚Äôt get past this one. Funny, the little angel came into the office, and looked over my shoulder. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs such a timeless photo, Dad‚Ä¶ one that will live on for generations of humanity‚Ä¶‚Äù 

Of course I don‚Äôt turn around, haha no need for the kid to see his pops worked up eyes. As he leaves he says ‚Äúit‚Äôs why I want to build cars, for him‚Äù. 

He wasn‚Äôt even born yet. It would be seven months later when you would tell the crew and the Fast production ‚ÄúVins gotta get to New York to receive his son‚Äù. You had that ability to refocus everyone including a whole production to the important things in life. 

For me this picture represents the moment I knew we would be brothers for eternity. January 2010, the night before you and I went to Haiti‚Ä¶ the passion and joy you had to simply help people. You said first responders shouldn‚Äôt have to wait for anyone‚Ä¶ and that you wanted to dedicate your life to that. First responders‚Ä¶ that was your true self, and you were sharing it with me, your brother. Haha. To this day, I imagine if you looked up ‚Äúfirst responder‚Äù in the dictionary, there would be a picture of you. Haha.  So as much as I would like to think we would be cutting cake and singing happy birthday for the big 50! We probably wouldn‚Äôt‚Ä¶ cause you would be in Maui or Morocco, or anywhere in this planet where people were in need. 

I miss you‚Ä¶ I love you, and I will continue to honor the beautiful soul you are. 

Happy Birthday‚Ä¶

There are brothers by blood‚Ä¶ and if we are fortunate in life, brothers by bond‚Ä¶
If we are really blessed, they become favorite uncles! Haha!

Happy Birthday!
Blessed to call you Family.

I reflect on how fortunate I am to have had you all believe in me‚Ä¶ it makes me want to reach higher‚Ä¶ and to make you proud. Thank you for being on this journey with me called life. 
Grateful and blessed‚Ä¶

Our angels back to school‚Ä¶ now it‚Äôs time, to choose a ‚ÄúClass‚Äù‚Ä¶ haha. 

Stay positive, focused‚Ä¶ and above all, Stay Human. 

All love, Always.

So grateful and blessed, to have traveled to so many wonderful countries, like India‚Ä¶ and to experience their beautiful cultures‚Ä¶  a lucky kid from New York. Haha. 
All love, Always.

Those who have followed me know that I have had my share of encounters with Bears in the North East‚Ä¶ usually after I have released a block buster movie. Haha. However I have been here in the north west and I have heard about the bear pop up here and to my surprise I actually ran into a bear of a human! Haha. @dc_mma 

I can‚Äôt tell you how many times I have watched this man perform in awe of his ability and character. I know he is a hall of famer‚Ä¶ but to meet this gentle soul in person is something else. Daniel Cormier has always been one of my favorites to watch compete‚Ä¶ he is a genuine soul. Blessed am I. 
All love, Always.
